听力障碍会增加患痴呆症的风险吗？听力障碍与未来痴呆症之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Does-hearing-impairment-increase-the-risk-of-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Does-hearing-impairment-increase-the-risk-of-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a9593ae-2b3e-40c5-aa67-45126c67c6cd Thu, 07 Dec 2023 03:58:00 -0500 Does hearing impairment increase the risk of dementia?
人工智能有助于早期发现乳腺癌人工智能的使用使得乳腺癌高危女性可以在乳房X光筛查检查中被识别出来，从而可以更早地发现癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/AI-aids-in-early-detection-of-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/AI-aids-in-early-detection-of-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fd572e1-6863-41f3-a08b-0900b033be7f Wed, 06 Dec 2023 23:57:00 -0500 AI aids in early detection of breast cancer
钙通道阻滞剂：血管痉挛性心绞痛孕妇的新希望一名希望怀孕的女性被诊断出患有严重血管痉挛性心绞痛（VSA）；然而，根据发表在《JACC 心脏产科特刊：病例报告》上的一个病例，在开始钙通道阻滞剂治疗后，她能够怀上健康的婴儿直至足月，且没有心绞痛发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Calcium-channel-blockers-A-new-hope-for-pregnant-women-with-vasospastic-angina.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Calcium-channel-blockers-A-new-hope-for-pregnant-women-with-vasospastic-angina.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62916eed-3371-4dc8-b5aa-120839d9c0ed Wed, 06 Dec 2023 23:49:28 -0500 Calcium channel blockers: A new hope for pregnant women with vasospastic angina
了解剥夺措施：公平公共卫生资源分配的关键在大流行期间，COVID-19 对黑人社区和有色人种社区的打击尤其严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Understanding-deprivation-measures-A-key-to-equitable-public-health-resource-allocation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Understanding-deprivation-measures-A-key-to-equitable-public-health-resource-allocation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f9779e7-4ca5-4bb4-b303-00f1d5a1f5e7 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 23:26:00 -0500 Understanding deprivation measures: A key to equitable public health resource allocation
PFAS 暴露与年轻人骨骼脆弱有关全氟烷基物质和多氟烷基物质 (PFAS) 是食品包装和化妆品等产品中使用的人造化学品，可能导致生殖问题、癌症风险增加和其他健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/PFAS-exposure-linked-to-weaker-bones-in-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/PFAS-exposure-linked-to-weaker-bones-in-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ee9237f-421b-4c71-9017-7348a83327b6 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 23:06:46 -0500 PFAS exposure linked to weaker bones in young people
研究表明，南非醉茄提取物有望减少压力荷尔蒙一项系统综述表明，睡茄（Ashwagandha）提取物可以在短期内有效降低皮质醇水平，为压力管理提供一种天然的替代方案，但长期影响尚未得到探索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Ashwagandha-extracts-show-promise-in-reducing-stress-hormones-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Ashwagandha-extracts-show-promise-in-reducing-stress-hormones-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f93d8410-68c4-4b26-b2b1-1680501b5f87 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 22:51:00 -0500 Ashwagandha extracts show promise in reducing stress hormones, study suggests
研究人员获得 NSF 200 万美元拨款，继续对抗空气传播的病原体Bahareh Behkam 和合作者获得了美国国家科学基金会 (NSF) 的 200 万美元资助，以继续对抗空气传播的病原体https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Researchers-receive-242-million-NSF-grant-to-continue-fight-against-airborne-pathogens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Researchers-receive-242-million-NSF-grant-to-continue-fight-against-airborne-pathogens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5816e55-086e-4775-9965-ffd39bda9cec Wed, 06 Dec 2023 22:48:00 -0500 Researchers receive $2 million NSF grant to continue fight against airborne pathogens
研究表明，为了幸福而独处和社交之间不存在“一刀切”的平衡《科学报告》中的研究发现，独处和社交对于心理健康之间并没有“最佳”平衡，这表明个人偏好和动机在幸福感中发挥着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Study-reveals-no-one-size-fits-all-balance- Between-solitude-and-socializing-for-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Study-reveals-no-one-size-fits-all-balance- Between-solitude-and-socializing-for-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3500cc8c-f623-4cb9-9178-f31f997fb1e5 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 22:31:00 -0500 Study reveals no 'one-size-fits-all' balance between solitude and socializing for well-being
新研究可能为治疗阴道酵母菌感染铺平道路有一天，新的研究可能会为体内微生物如何吸收锌提供新的线索，从而为治疗阴道酵母菌感染铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/New-research-may-pave-the-way-for-treatment-of-vaginal-yeast-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/New-research-may-pave-the-way-for-treatment-of-vaginal-yeast-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40d76475-fab6-4640-927d-536d48f7222e Wed, 06 Dec 2023 22:12:00 -0500 New research may pave the way for treatment of vaginal yeast infections
新研究发现，长期感染新冠病毒的患者表现出明显的认知减慢研究人员发现，与对照组相比，长期感染新冠病毒的患者表现出中度至重度认知减慢，突显了新冠病毒 (COVID-19) 后状况的独特认知特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Long-COVID-病人-exhibit-significant-cognitive-slowing-new-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Long-COVID-病人-exhibit-significant-cognitive-slowing-new-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a571c82c-e0de-406c-83d8-820c46923281 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 22:09:00 -0500 Long COVID patients exhibit significant cognitive slowing, new study finds
